requestBody.description: DTO of the user information and conditions for creating a meeting.

201.description: DTO of the created zoom meeting information.

default_password.title: Whether to create a default password.
default_password.description: If this value is true and the user has enabled PMI settings with passwords, the user's meetings will use the PMI password.

duration.title: The scheduled time (duration) of the meeting.
duration.description:
The scheduled time of the meeting, in minutes.

Used only when a meeting is scheduled.

password.title: Meeting password.
password.description: It means a password consisting of English uppercase and lowercase letters and '@', '-', '_', '*'.

pre_schedule.title: Whether to create a scheduled meeting via the `GSuite` app.

assistant_id.title: The ID of the user who hosted this meeting.

host_email.title: The email address of the meeting organizer.

created_at.title: The date and time this meeting was created.

pstn_password.title: Password to join the meeting via PSTN.

join_url.title: The URL where participants can join the meeting.

chat_join_url.title: URL where you can join the chat.

recurrence.title: Information about the meeting's recurrence cycle.

start_url.title: URL that allows you to join as the meeting host.
start_url.description:
This URL should only be used by the meeting host and should not be shared with other participants.

Anyone with this URL can log into the Zoom client with host privileges.

type.title: Type of meeting.
type.description:
- 1: Instant meeting.
- 2: Scheduled meeting.
- 3: Recurring meeting without fixed time.
- 8: Recurring meeting with fixed time.
- 10: Meeting with screen sharing only.

duration.title: An integer representing the duration of the webinar.

occurrence_id.title: A unique identifier that identifies each webinar occurrence.

end_date_time.title: This means the last day before the meeting ends.
end_date_time.description:
If the meeting is not cancelled, this means the last day of the meeting.

Cannot be used with `end_times`.

end_times.title: The number of repetitions before the meeting is finally terminated.
end_times.description:
Indicates how many times the meeting will repeat before it is canceled.

If end_times is set to 0, it means there is no end time.

type.title: Meeting repetition cycle.
type.description: 1 is daily, 2 is weekly, 3 is monthly, indicating the repetition type.

monthly_day.title: The days from 1 to 31 of the month.
monthly_day.description: It means the days from 1 to 31 of the month, and is the value set when `type` is 3, that is, it repeats every month.

monthly_week.title: Indicates which week of each month.
monthly_week.description:
Indicates which week of each month.

This is the value set when `type` is 3, that is, the meeting is repeated every month.

- -1: Last week of the month.
- 1: First week of the month.
- 2: Second week of the month.
- 3: Third week of the month.
- 4: Fourth week of the month.

monthly_week_day.title: Indicates which day of the week it is each month.
monthly_week_day.description:
This is the value set when `type` is 3, that is, a meeting that repeats every month.

If multiple days are selected, the numbers are connected using the `,` symbol in the form of '1,3'.

- 1 - Sunday.
- 2 - Monday.
- 3 - Tuesday.
- 4 - Wednesday.
- 5 - Thursday.
- 6 - Friday.
- 7 - Saturday.

repeat_interval.title: Interval between meetings.
repeat_interval.description:
When `type` is 1, i.e., for meetings set to daily, up to 90 (days) is possible.

When `type` is 2, i.e., for meetings set to weekly, up to 12 (weeks) is possible.

When `type` is 3, i.e., for meetings set to monthly, up to 3 (months) is possible.

weekly_days.title: Indicates which day of the week it is.
weekly_days.description:
This is the value set when `type` is 2, that is, a meeting that repeats every week.

If multiple days are selected, the numbers are connected using the `,` symbol in the form of '1,3'.

- 1 - Sunday.
- 2 - Monday.
- 3 - Tuesday.
- 4 - Wednesday.
- 5 - Thursday.
- 6 - Friday.
- 7 - Saturday.

IZoom.Recurrence.title: Information about the meeting's recurrence cycle.

allow_multiple_devices.title: Whether participants can join from multiple devices.
allow_multiple_devices.description: Sets whether participants can join from multiple devices in a meeting where registration is enabled.

alternative_hosts.title: A semicolon-separated list of email addresses or IDs for alternate hosts.

alternative_hosts_email_notification.title: Whether to send email notifications to alternate hosts.

approval_type.title: Meeting registration approval settings.
approval_type.description:
- 0 : Automatic approval
- 1 : Manual approval
- 2 : No registration required (default)

approved_list.title: List of approved countries or regions.

denied_list.title: List of blocked countries or regions.

enable.title: Whether to enable or disable user authorization or blocking settings for specific countries and regions.

audio.title: How participants join the audio portion of the meeting.
audio.description:
- `both` - Both telephony and VoIP.
- `telephony` - Telephony only.
- `voip` - VoIP only.
- `thirdParty` - Third party audio conference.

authentication_domains.title: The meeting's authenticated domains
authentication_domains.description:
The meeting's authenticated domains.

Only Zoom users whose email address contains an authenticated domain can join the meeting.

Comma-separate multiple domains or use a wildcard for listing domains.

join_url.title: URL for participants to join the meeting.

authentication_exception.title: A list of participants that can bypass meeting authentication
authentication_exception.description:
A list of participants that can bypass meeting authentication.

These participants will receive a unique meeting invite.

authentication_name.title: Authentication name set in the authentication profile.

auto_recording.title: Automatic recording. local - Record on local.

enable.title: Set this field's value to true to enable the breakout room pre-assign option
enable.description: Set this field's value to true to enable the breakout room pre-assign option.

participants.title: Email addresses of the participants who are to be assigned to the breakout room
participants.description: Email addresses of the participants who are to be assigned to the breakout room.

calendar_type.title: The type of calendar integration used to schedule the meeting
calendar_type.description:
The type of calendar integration used to schedule the meeting.

- 1 - Zoom Outlook add-in
- 2 - Zoom for Google Workspace add-on

Works with the private_meeting field to determine whether to share details of meetings or not.

contact_email.title: The contact email address for meeting registration.

contact_name.title: The contact name for meeting registration.

custom_keys.title: Custom keys and values assigned to the meeting.

email_notification.title: Whether to send email notifications to alternative hosts and users with scheduling privileges
email_notification.description: Whether to send email notifications to alternative hosts and users with scheduling privileges.

encryption_type.title: Choose between enhanced encryption and end-to-end encryption when starting or a meeting
encryption_type.description:
Choose between enhanced encryption and end-to-end encryption when starting or a meeting.

When using end-to-end encryption, several features (e.g. cloud recording, phone/SIP/H.323 dial-in) will be automatically disabled.

- enhanced_encryption - Enhanced encryption. Encryption is stored in the cloud if you enable this option.
- e2ee - End-to-end encryption. The encryption key is stored in your local device and can not be obtained by anyone else. Enabling this setting also disables the join before host, cloud recording, streaming, live transcription, breakout rooms, polling, 1:1 private chat, and meeting reactions features.

enforce_login.title: Only signed in users can join this meeting
enforce_login.description: Only signed in users can join this meeting.

enforce_login_domains.title: Only signed in users with specified domains can join meetings
enforce_login_domains.description:
Only signed in users with specified domains can join meetings.

This field is deprecated and will not be supported in the future.

focus_mode.title: Whether the Focus Mode feature is enabled when the meeting starts.

city.title: city of the number.
city.description: City of the number, such as Chicago.

country.title: The country code.
country.description: The country code, such as BR.

country_name.title: Full name of country.
country_name.description: Full name of country, such as Brazil.

host_video.title: Start video when the host joins the meeting.

jbh_time.title: If the value of join_before_host field is set to true, use this field to indicate time limits when a participant may join a meeting before a host
jbh_time.description:
If the value of join_before_host field is set to true, use this field to indicate time limits when a participant may join a meeting before a host.

- 0 - Allow participant to join anytime.
- 5- Allow participant to join 5 minutes before meeting start time.
- 10 - Allow participant to join 10 minutes before meeting start time.

join_before_host.title: Allow participants to join the meeting before the host starts the meeting. Only used for scheduled or recurring meetings
join_before_host.description: Allow participants to join the meeting before the host starts the meeting. Only used for scheduled or recurring meetings.

enable.title: Whether to enable language interpretation for the meeting
enable.description: Whether to enable language interpretation for the meeting.

languages.title: comma-separated list of the interpreter's languages
languages.description:
comma-separated list of the interpreter's languages.

The string must contain two country IDs.

For example, if the interpreter will translate from English to Chinese, then this value will be US,CN.

interpreters.title: Information about the meeting's sign language interpreters
interpreters.description: Information about the meeting's sign language interpreters.

enable.title: Whether to enable sign language interpretation for the meeting
enable.description: Whether to enable sign language interpretation for the meeting.

sign_language.title: The interpreter's sign language
sign_language.description:
The interpreter's sign language.

To get this value, use the sign_language_interpretation object's languages and custom_languages values in the Get user settings API response.

interpreters.title: Information about the meeting's sign language interpreters
interpreters.description: Information about the meeting's sign language interpreters.

sign_language_interpretation.title: The meeting's sign language interpretation settings
sign_language_interpretation.description:
The meeting's sign language interpretation settings.

Make sure to add the language in the web portal in order to use it in the API. See link for details.

Note: If this feature is not enabled on the host's account, this setting will not be applied to the meeting.

meeting_authentication.title: If true, only authenticated users can join the meeting
meeting_authentication.description: If true, only authenticated users can join the meeting.

mute_upon_entry.title: Whether to mute participants upon entry
mute_upon_entry.description: Whether to mute participants upon entry.

participant_video.title: Whether to start meetings with the participant video on
participant_video.description: Whether to start meetings with the participant video on.

private_meeting.title: Whether to set the meeting as private
private_meeting.description: Whether to set the meeting as private.

registrants_confirmation_email.title: Whether to send registrants an email confirmation
registrants_confirmation_email.description:
Whether to send registrants an email confirmation.

- true - Send a confirmation email.
- false - Do not send a confirmation email.

registrants_email_notification.title: Whether to send registrants email notifications about their registration approval, cancellation, or rejection
registrants_email_notification.description:
Whether to send registrants email notifications about their registration approval, cancellation, or rejection.

- true - Send an email notification.
- false - Do not send an email notification.

Set this value to true to also use the registrants_confirmation_email parameter.

registration_type.title: The meeting's registration type
registration_type.description:
The meeting's registration type.

- 1 - Attendees register once and can attend any meeting occurrence.
- 2 - Attendees must register for each meeting occurrence.
- 3 - Attendees register once and can select one or more meeting occurrences to attend.

This field is only for recurring meetings with fixed times (8). This value defaults to 1.

show_share_button.title: Whether to include social media sharing buttons on the meeting's registration page
show_share_button.description:
Whether to include social media sharing buttons on the meeting's registration page.

This setting is only applied to meetings with registration enabled.

use_pmi.title: Whether to use a Personal Meeting ID (PMI) instead of a generated meeting ID
use_pmi.description:
Whether to use a Personal Meeting ID (PMI) instead of a generated meeting ID.

This field is only used for scheduled meetings (2), instant meetings (1), or recurring meetings with no fixed time (3).

waiting_room.title: Whether to enable the Waiting Room feature. If this value is true, this disables the join_before_host setting
waiting_room.description: Whether to enable the Waiting Room feature. If this value is true, this disables the join_before_host setting.

watermark.title: Whether to add a watermark when viewing a shared screen
watermark.description: Whether to add a watermark when viewing a shared screen.

host_save_video_order.title: Whether the Allow host to save video order feature is enabled
host_save_video_order.description: Whether the Allow host to save video order feature is enabled.

internal_meeting.title: Whether to set the meeting as an internal meeting
internal_meeting.description: Whether to set the meeting as an internal meeting.

meeting_invitees.title: A list of the meeting's invitees
meeting_invitees.description: A list of the meeting's invitees.

enable.title: Whether to enable the Enable continuous meeting chat setting
enable.description: Whether to enable the Enable continuous meeting chat setting.

auto_add_invited_external_users.title: Whether to enable the Automatically add invited external users setting
auto_add_invited_external_users.description: Whether to enable the Automatically add invited external users setting.

continuous_meeting_chat.title: Information about the Enable continuous meeting chat feature
continuous_meeting_chat.description: Information about the Enable continuous meeting chat feature.

participant_focused_meeting.title: Whether to set the meeting as a participant focused meeting
participant_focused_meeting.description: Whether to set the meeting as a participant focused meeting.

push_change_to_calendar.title: Whether to push meeting changes to the calendar
push_change_to_calendar.description:
Whether to push meeting changes to the calendar.

To enable this feature, configure the Configure Calendar and Contacts Service in the user's profile page of the Zoom web portal and enable the Automatically sync Zoom calendar events information bi-directionally between Zoom and integrated calendars.

setting in the Settings page of the Zoom web portal.

- true - Push meeting changes to the calendar.
- false - Do not push meeting changes to the calendar.

permission_level.title: The permission levels for users to access the whiteboard
permission_level.description:
The permission levels for users to access the whiteboard.

- `editor` - Users with link access can edit the board.
- `commenter` - Users with link access can comment on the board.
- `viewer` - Users with link access can view the board.

auto_start_meeting_summary.title: Whether to automatically start a meeting summary
auto_start_meeting_summary.description: Whether to automatically start a meeting summary.

auto_start_ai_companion_questions.title: Whether to automatically start AI Companion questions
auto_start_ai_companion_questions.description: Whether to automatically start AI Companion questions.

key.title: Custom key associated with the user.

value.title: Value of the custom key associated with the user.

typia.tag.title: This is a dummy property for compilation
typia.tag.description:
This is a dummy property for compilation.

It does not mean anything in runtime.

IZoom.TrackingField.description: Information about the meeting's tracking fields.
